saying: Make hay while the sun shines.
description: Colton is a smug, horse villager in the Animal Crossing series. He first appeared in Animal Crossing: New Leaf. His name Colton derives from the young male horse, a colt. His catchphrase likely refers to both his smug personality and the act of "checking" opponents in chess. His noble theming and knightly pose in his New Leaf render give him a knight motif, referencing the white horse-shaped knight piece in chess.
